entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
